short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Bookmarks - Makes the bookmark system easy :)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Bookmarks makes your bookmark system easy and more user friendly. With the help of this, you can save your important URL with an attractive user interface. You can save your URL by just clicking on “Bookmark” button and also it provides you to categorize your saved URL so you can filter that easily. Offline mode provides access to your saved data without having the internet. 

As we are not taking your personal data so no need to worry about it. We are using your local store to provide you with better offline support and user experience.

We are using an external API to authenticate you and keep your saved data to be safe on the server. So you can access your data with any platform or system hindrance.
